remarks: Variation of Axiom of Infinity.  There exists a nonempty set that is a subset of its union (using ~ zfinf as a hypothesis).  Abbreviated version of the Axiom of Infinity in [FreydScedrov] p. 283.  (Contributed by NM, 28-Oct-1996.)
statement:
inf1.1 $e |- E. x ( y e. x /\ A. y ( y e. x -> E. z ( y e. z /\ z e. x ) ) ) $.
inf2 $p |- E. x ( x =/= (/) /\ x C_ U. x ) $.
$d x y z $.
